Posts.Content: I finished chemo 9 months ago and started Letrozole after rads. My hair was slow to start growing, and has come back fine and quite wispy. My big concern is that it's still very sparse on top, and I've read that some women have male pattern baldness long term on Letrozole.Anyone else have problems with slow growth and thin hair on top? I feel so well now but my lack of hair is starting to get me down. Trivial I know, but I wasn't prepared for it to be so patchy and thin.
Posts.Title: Letrozole and hair thinning

Posts.Content: I'm certainly going to do that Dorothee- good idea x
Posts.Title: How soon will I get some hair?

Posts.Content: I finished Tax 8 weeks ago followed by 3 weeks of rads- still no hair in sight. I.ve got an all over stubble that you can feel but not really see. Am I being impatient in expecting it to grow by now? I've scared myself by reading some stuff about people with permanent baldness after Taxotere.
Posts.Title: How soon will I get some hair?
